ruling: - If one of the monsters Special Summoned by [[Rescue Cat]]'s effect is flipped face-down, or removed from play temporarily, the effect of [[Rescue Cat]] is reset and that monster is not destroyed during the End Phase.
- If your opponent controls your [[Rescue Cat]] and activates its effect, your opponent gets the effect and Special Summons Beast-Type monsters from his/her Deck.
- You cannot activate [[Rescue Cat]]'s effect if there are 1 or less Level 3 or lower Beast-Type monsters in your Deck.
- Destroying the Special Summoned monsters during the End Phase does not start a Chain.
